messages.subject: *SIGH** Big DH hurdle to try and overcome
messages.msgSnippet: .... and finally show him how unschooly he has been in his life. You know, Markus was the same way. A true unschooler at heart, but just had such a hard
messages.messageBody:
...."and finally show him how "unschooly" he has been in his life."

You know, Markus was the same way. A true unschooler at heart, but
just had such a hard time applying it to his children. When I was
searching for a guitar instructor for Trevor, Markus says "make sure
you find a teacher that will let him learn whatever he wants and not
suck the joy out of playing."
NO...REALLY honey?;) I'd just look at him like "WHY are you having
such a hard time with all of this????"

He finally had his epiphany, but he still thinks some chores are ok.
Most of the time he just handles whatever is bugging him, rather than
bugging the kids though. I think he's had enough of my mother bear
tendencies for a while.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
